tool_description: Calculates comprehensive lead scores based on multiple prospect attributes, behaviors, and fit criteria to prioritize sales efforts effectively.

prospect_data.description: List of prospect identifiers or names to score

scoring_criteria.description: Criteria to include: company_size, industry, budget, authority, need, timing, engagement

minimum_score.description: Minimum score to include in results (0-100)

error_messages: Invalid prospect data: At least one prospect identifier must be provided
Invalid scoring criteria: Must include at least one of company_size, industry, budget, authority, need, timing, engagement
Weight values invalid: All weight values must be between 0 and 1
Weights don't sum to 1: The sum of all weight values should equal 1.0
Invalid minimum score: Must be between 0 and 100
Insufficient data: Not enough data available to score some prospects
usage: Provide prospect data and specify scoring criteria with appropriate weights. The tool calculates composite scores based on multiple factors and returns prioritized lead rankings.

scored_prospects.description: List of prospects with their calculated scores

lead_scores.description: Calculated lead scores (0-100) for each prospect

score_breakdown.description: Detailed score breakdown for each prospect
